comments.text:
Here's an interesting little behavior that's surprising and slightly undesirable. Filing mostly in case it points the way to anything more serious.

1. Open a couple of tabs with content long enough to scroll.
2. Using the two-finger trackpad gesture, give one of the tabs a scrolling "fling".
3. Before it has come to rest, close the tab with command-W.

The newly revealed tab will itself begin to scroll, receiving the remaining inertia from the closed tab.
comments.author: grinch@grinchcentral.com
comments.creator: grinch@grinchcentral.com
